2018730.name: Journey to the Pumpkin Planet
2018730.description:
Journey to the Pumpkin Planet is a game about building cities and managing natural resources. You play as a promising young city planner, born in the final years of sustainable life on planet Earth. You will be forced to make difficult ethical and strategic decisions as you develop your skills, before embarking on a journey across the stars.

  • Play through 8 chapters, each with unique buildings, mechanics, and resources, lasting 10-15 minutes each.
  • Wrap your brain around deterministic turn-based challenges, with multiple viable strategies and paths to victory.
  • Understand the long-term impact of your decisions, as some natural resources are finite, and actions snowball over weeks and years.
  • Develop a relationship with a childhood friend, as your paths cross and intertwine during humanity's migration to the pumpkin planet.
  • Take on the endless winter survival mode in the procedurally-generated epilogue.
2018730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
